publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-357 Linda Fabiani: Establishment of Committee on International Relations—That the Parliament notes (a) the Memorandum of Understanding between Her Majesty’s Government and the devolved administrations in Scotland and Wales and its associated Concordats and notes in particular the terms of the Concordat on International Relations; (b) views the involvement of the Scottish Ministers in the formulation of UK policy and conduct of international negotiations and implementation of international commitments as important matters deserving of scrutiny by this Parliament; (c) resolves to establish a Committee on International Relations to consider and report on matters of international relations outwith the activities of the European Community or European Union that may affect the work of the Parliament, and (d) calls upon the Parliamentary Bureau to bring forward proposals for the membership and duration of such a Committee.
S1M-357 Establishment of Committee on International Relations (lodged on 6 December 1999) Michael Matheson*, Michael Russell*
S1M-357 Establishment of Committee on International Relations (lodged on 6 December 1999) Shona Robison*, Colin Campbell*

S1M-357 Linda Fabiani: Establishment of Committee on International Relations—That the Parliament notes (a) the Memorandum of Understanding between Her Majesty’s Government and the devolved administrations in Scotland and Wales and its associated Concordats and notes in particular the terms of the Concordat on International Relations; (b) views the involvement of the Scottish Ministers in the formulation of UK policy and conduct of international negotiations and implementation of international commitments as important matters deserving of scrutiny by this Parliament; (c) resolves to establish a Committee on International Relations to consider and report on matters of international relations outwith the activities of the European Community or European Union that may affect the work of the Parliament, and (d) calls upon the Parliamentary Bureau to bring forward proposals for the membership and duration of such a Committee. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Michael Russell, Shona Robison, Colin Campbell, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-357 Establishment of Committee on International Relations (lodged on 6 December 1999) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-357 Establishment of Committee on International Relations (lodged on 6 December 1999) Alasdair Morgan*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-357 Establishment of Committee on International Relations (lodged on 6 December 1999) Alex Neil*
S1M-357 Establishment of Committee on International Relations (lodged on 6 December 1999) Richard Lochhead*

Supported by: Michael Matheson, Michael Russell, Shona Robison, Colin Campbell, Fiona Hyslop, Andrew Wilson, Alasdair Morgan, Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil, Richard Lochhead, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-357 Establishment of Committee on International Relations (lodged on 6 December 1999) Ms Margo MacDonald*
